data.text: Haa……haa……haa……haa……haa.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Haa……haa……haa……haa……haa.

data.text: Huu～……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Huu～……

data.text:
The time difference is 8 hours――
I wonder if El is also running right now.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>The time difference is 8 hours――
<story>I wonder if El is also running right now.

data.text:
Grass Wonder, she was the favorite to win, but at the end she was 
unable to pull ahead and took 6th……!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Grass Wonder, she was the favorite to win, but at the end she was 
<story>unable to pull ahead and took 6th……!

data.text:
The Junior Class champion, who spent most of her Classic year 
continuously battling injuries!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>The Junior Class champion, who spent most of her Classic year 
<story>continuously battling injuries!

data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: Grass.
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Grass.

data.text:
I'm sorry……I thought I could win here, so at the next 『Japan Cup』 
I could run together with El and Spe-chan, but……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>I'm sorry……I thought I could win here, so at the next 『Japan Cup』 
<story>I could run together with El and Spe-chan, but……

data.text: But with this result, I……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>But with this result, I……

data.text: ……Geez.
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>……Geez.

data.text:
Grass……! Lately you've been flustered and panicking! 
It's not like you at all!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Grass……! Lately you've been flustered and panicking! 
<story>It's not like you at all!

data.text:
Usually you're more composed, Grass is usually tranquil but 
burning with passion! Calm and imposing is the usual Grass!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Usually you're more composed, Grass is usually tranquil but 
<story>burning with passion! Calm and imposing is the usual Grass!

data.text: ……El.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>……El.

data.text:
After the 『Japan Cup』, I'm going overseas to take hold of my 
dream to be the world's strongest.
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>After the 『Japan Cup』, I'm going overseas to take hold of my 
<story>dream to be the world's strongest.

data.text:
And after that, let's have another match! 
Until then, Grass, please keep getting waaaaaay stronger!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>And after that, let's have another match! 
<story>Until then, Grass, please keep getting waaaaaay stronger!

data.text:
After I become the world's strongest and return, 
you won't even be able to keep up with El!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>After I become the world's strongest and return, 
<story>you won't even be able to keep up with El!

data.text: ……That's right.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>……That's right.

data.text: Stay calm and composed……and focus on the match.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Stay calm and composed……and focus on the match.

data.text:
……If El is going to take the path of "World's Strongest", 
then I need to find a path to the summit――
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>……If El is going to take the path of "World's Strongest", 
<story>then I need to find a path to the summit――

data.text: A match against the Derby Uma Musume from my year――
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>A match against the Derby Uma Musume from my year――

data.text:
Finally, the 『Takarazuka Kinen』 was approaching, and a press 
conference was held for the participating Uma Musume.
data.processed:
<story>Finally, the 『Takarazuka Kinen』 was approaching, and a press 
<story>conference was held for the participating Uma Musume.

data.text:
This year's focus, as expected, is on the first battle between 
Special Week and Grass Wonder.
data.name: Reporter A
data.processed:
<story>This year's focus, as expected, is on the first battle between 
<story>Special Week and Grass Wonder.

data.text:
You could say that among the "Golden Generation", this is the 
card that most people wanted to see. A battle between the Derby 
Uma Musume and the Grand Prix Uma Musume.
data.name: Reporter B
data.processed:
<story>You could say that among the "Golden Generation", this is the 
<story>card that most people wanted to see. A battle between the Derby 
<story>Uma Musume and the Grand Prix Uma Musume.

data.text:
And now, the interview with 
Team <Sirius>'s Special Week will begin.
data.name: MC
data.processed:
<story>And now, the interview with 
<story>Team <Sirius>'s Special Week will begin.

data.text: Thank you for your support!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Thank you for your support!

data.text:
Since the beginning of the year, you've won 3 majors 
consecutively but, in regards to the upcoming 『Takarazuka Kinen』, 
how is your current condition?
data.name: Reporter A
data.processed:
<story>Since the beginning of the year, you've won 3 majors 
<story>consecutively but, in regards to the upcoming 『Takarazuka Kinen』, 
<story>how is your current condition?

data.text:
Yes! I've been able to complete training with no issues, 
there are absolutely no problems with my condition.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Yes! I've been able to complete training with no issues, 
<story>there are absolutely no problems with my condition.

data.text:
Based on your results in the 『Takarazuka Kinen』, I've heard that 
the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 is your next goal.
data.name: Reporter B
data.processed:
<story>Based on your results in the 『Takarazuka Kinen』, I've heard that 
<story>the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 is your next goal.

data.text:
If it's determined that I can get results over there too, 
then I plan on going overseas!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>If it's determined that I can get results over there too, 
<story>then I plan on going overseas!

data.text:
I see, so this 『Takarazuka Kinen』 is 
being used to judge if you are ready.
data.name: Reporter B
data.processed:
<story>I see, so this 『Takarazuka Kinen』 is 
<story>being used to judge if you are ready.

data.text:
What about the opponent you'll be facing there, Grass Wonder, 
what are your thoughts?
data.name: Reporter B
data.processed:
<story>What about the opponent you'll be facing there, Grass Wonder, 
<story>what are your thoughts?

data.text:
When Grass-chan won last year's 『Arima Kinen』 I thought she was 
really strong and had an amazing run.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>When Grass-chan won last year's 『Arima Kinen』 I thought she was 
<story>really strong and had an amazing run.

data.text: But even so, I won't be discouraged!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>But even so, I won't be discouraged!

data.text:
With the same feelings that won me the 『Spring Tenno Sho』, 
when it comes to Grass-chan, I'll definitely……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>With the same feelings that won me the 『Spring Tenno Sho』, 
<story>when it comes to Grass-chan, I'll definitely……!

data.text:
Uooooh～～!! 
Guuuuuuuuuuts～～!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Uooooh～～!! 
<story>Guuuuuuuuuuts～～!!

data.text:
Don't strain yourself to the point your body can't keep up! 
Just focus on the proper form!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Don't strain yourself to the point your body can't keep up! 
<story>Just focus on the proper form!

data.text: Foooooooormmmmmーー!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Foooooooormmmmmーー!!

data.text:
In preparation for the coming 『Takarazuka Kinen』, 
Special Week put much more spirit in to her training.
data.processed:
<story>In preparation for the coming 『Takarazuka Kinen』, 
<story>Special Week put much more spirit in to her training.

data.text: Haaa……haaa……bueee～……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Haaa……haaa……bueee～……

data.text:
Uoooooooh～! Your time has gotten better since yesterday! 
That's amazing Spe-chan!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Uoooooooh～! Your time has gotten better since yesterday! 
<story>That's amazing Spe-chan!

data.text:
Alright, we'll do one more lap as a cooldown, 
after that we'll switch to the dirt menu.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Alright, we'll do one more lap as a cooldown, 
<story>after that we'll switch to the dirt menu.

data.text:
Alright, we'll do one more lap as a cooldown, 
after that we'll switch to the dirt menu.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Alright, we'll do one more lap as a cooldown, 
<story>after that we'll switch to the dirt menu.

data.text: Fuu～……Yeah!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Fuu～……Yeah!

data.text:
Her condition, and her emotional state too, 
seems like there are no issues.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Her condition, and her emotional state too, 
<story>seems like there are no issues.

data.text:
That's just how badly she wants to win the 『Takarazuka Kinen』. 
That feeling, is properly conveyed to me too.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>That's just how badly she wants to win the 『Takarazuka Kinen』. 
<story>That feeling, is properly conveyed to me too.

data.text:
That's just how badly she wants to win the 『Takarazuka Kinen』. 
That feeling, is properly conveyed to me too.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>That's just how badly she wants to win the 『Takarazuka Kinen』. 
<story>That feeling, is properly conveyed to me too.

data.text:
Ehehe, me too. I definitely want to see Spe-chan 
become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", too!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Ehehe, me too. I definitely want to see Spe-chan 
<story>become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", too!

data.text:
That's why, I'll help in any way I can! 
As long as it doesn't require me to use my head!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>That's why, I'll help in any way I can! 
<story>As long as it doesn't require me to use my head!

data.text:
Me too, if there's anything I can do, I want to help out too. 
Because I'll always want to see our teammates win.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Me too, if there's anything I can do, I want to help out too. 
<story>Because I'll always want to see our teammates win.

data.text: Alright, let's take the 『Takarazuka Kinen』 too!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Alright, let's take the 『Takarazuka Kinen』 too!

data.text: Yeah, for sure!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Yeah, for sure!

data.text: Yeah, for sure!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Yeah, for sure!

data.text:
Last year, the one who lead all the way to the goal 
was Silence Suzuka, now her dream has taken her 
overseas, and even now the fans are excited!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Last year, the one who lead all the way to the goal 
<story>was Silence Suzuka, now her dream has taken her 
<story>overseas, and even now the fans are excited!

data.text:
And this year, once again, everyone's running for their dream―― 
Hanshin Racecourse, main race, the 『Takarazuka Kinen』!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>And this year, once again, everyone's running for their dream―― 
<story>Hanshin Racecourse, main race, the 『Takarazuka Kinen』!

data.text:
As the excitement rises on the first battle between 
Special Week and Grass Wonder on this stage, which 
Uma Musume will take hold of that glory!?
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>As the excitement rises on the first battle between 
<story>Special Week and Grass Wonder on this stage, which 
<story>Uma Musume will take hold of that glory!?

data.text: Su～～…… Haaaaa～～……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Su～～…… Haaaaa～～……

data.text:
Good, good, good, looks like you've calmed down. 
Just like in the 『Spring Tenno Sho』 if you carry 
yourself calmly during the race, you'll win!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Good, good, good, looks like you've calmed down. 
<story>Just like in the 『Spring Tenno Sho』 if you carry 
<story>yourself calmly during the race, you'll win!

data.text:
It's rare that Gold Ship-san gives useful advice but, 
just run as you have been―― of course.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>It's rare that Gold Ship-san gives useful advice but, 
<story>just run as you have been―― of course.

data.text: Calmly, run like I have been…… understood!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Calmly, run like I have been…… understood!

data.text:
The 『Takarazuka Kinen』 is considered the climax of the first half 
of the year in the Twinkle Series.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>The 『Takarazuka Kinen』 is considered the climax of the first half 
<story>of the year in the Twinkle Series.

data.text:
You've put in the efforts to get results thus far. After this, 
the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, is waiting for you too――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>You've put in the efforts to get results thus far. After this, 
<story>the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, is waiting for you too――

data.text: Yeah!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah!

data.text:
Finally, the participating Uma Musume 
have made their way on to the course!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Finally, the participating Uma Musume 
<story>have made their way on to the course!

data.text:
Special Week just came out! 
But man, listen to that cheer!
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed:
<story>Special Week just came out! 
<story>But man, listen to that cheer!

data.text:
For the 『Takarazuka Kinen』 vote she was the 
most popular, and today she's also the favorite, 
after all! Special Week, do your best!
data.name: Spectator B
data.processed:
<story>For the 『Takarazuka Kinen』 vote she was the 
<story>most popular, and today she's also the favorite, 
<story>after all! Special Week, do your best!

data.text: Waaaa!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Waaaa!

data.text:
Alright, I've done everything I could, 
and there's no problem with my condition…… 
I'm nervous but, because of that I'm focused……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Alright, I've done everything I could, 
<story>and there's no problem with my condition…… 
<story>I'm nervous but, because of that I'm focused……!

data.text: I can go at full strength……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>I can go at full strength……!

data.text: Finally, the time has come, Spe-chan.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Finally, the time has come, Spe-chan.

data.text: Grass-chan.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Grass-chan.

data.text:
We didn't get any chances until now, and I've been waiting for 
the day that we can run together like this.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>We didn't get any chances until now, and I've been waiting for 
<story>the day that we can run together like this.

data.text:
The Twinkle Series that I've looked up to since I was young…… 
to master this path, and stand at the summit is my dream.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>The Twinkle Series that I've looked up to since I was young…… 
<story>to master this path, and stand at the summit is my dream.

data.text:
El-chan and Spec-chan too, it means that 
you are both opponents I need to surpass.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>El-chan and Spec-chan too, it means that 
<story>you are both opponents I need to surpass.

data.text: I won't lose, Grass-chan……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>I won't lose, Grass-chan……!

data.text: ……then, I won't hold back.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>……then, I won't hold back.

data.text: All the Uma Musume have settled in their gates.
data.name: Announcer
data.processed: <story>All the Uma Musume have settled in their gates.

data.text:
Will it be Special Week that wins, or will it be Grass Wonder, 
or perhaps a different Uma Musume……
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Will it be Special Week that wins, or will it be Grass Wonder, 
<story>or perhaps a different Uma Musume……

data.text: The Twinkle Series' first half climax, the 『Takarazuka Kinen』――
data.name: Announcer
data.processed: <story>The Twinkle Series' first half climax, the 『Takarazuka Kinen』――

data.text:
Shouldering the dreams of the crowd, and all the fans in Japan, 
these 12 Uma Musume now start!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Shouldering the dreams of the crowd, and all the fans in Japan, 
<story>these 12 Uma Musume now start!
